title: Murder By Contract (1958, USA) Vince Edwards, Herschel Bernardi - Film Noir Full Movie

sources.title: Murder By Contract (1958, USA) Vince Edwards, Herschel Bernardi - Film Noir Full Movie
sources.description: Murder by Contract is a 1958 American film noir crime film directed by Irving Lerner. Academy Award-nominated screenwriter Ben Maddow did uncredited work on the film. The film has exerted an influence on American cinema, most notably on director Martin Scorsese, who famously cited Murder by Contract as the film that has influenced him most. Wikipedia: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Murder_by_Contract Suggested Film Noirs: http://bit.ly/2tLevkl The Internet Archive is an excellent choice for entire full length Netflix & YouTube style uploads of drama, mystery, thriller & crime noir movies from the UK & USA for free.
